评论详情: Fit very nicely on my daughter, she loves it and uses the chain on other pants as well wore them at a concert and the chain did not break would recommend!
The zipper on the crotch broke way too quickly. I wore them once and was so embarrassed about it breaking. This was a bummer because I really loved the fit and the way they looked! Returned
I love these pants! Love the material not at all like sweats but more like parachute. Comfortable, yet stylish and great fit! True to fit. 👍🏽👍🏽👍🏽👍🏽👍🏽

I love these joggers and how stretchy they are! The only unfortunate thing is the second time I wore them the zipper track on the front lost a tooth, rendering them unwearable. That said, I'll still most likely order them again because they're so versatile and stylish!
Got for a themed party and wore with my chucks.  I don’t think I would wear them daily tho
They fit decently but are not as flattering as I would have expected. Still cool though.
Love these pants. Material is soft and light and the chain makes them super fun.
I wore these to my trip in Salem, MA they are so comfy to walk around in and I love the zipper in the front

I'm IN LOVE. ✨️ These joggers are breathable but keep you warm and flexible. The chain is a cute little bonus AND gives you the chance to personalize up the style more !! Awesome that I don't necessarily HAVE to unzip them for quick bathroom usage either !! They slip on & off like sweats but look more stylish. Comfort 20/10

These pants look similar to the photo at first glance but the material is weird, feels like the material men's swim trunks are made from. They definitely do not sit like that on your body. They're only bunched up at the bottom by the ankles and the legs are pretty much straight and they are not flattering to your curves at all. They make your curves disappear.
